sn46.54:11.2.pli: ‘kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, mettācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:11.2.en: ‘But reverends, how is the heart’s release by love developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and culmination?

sn46.54:11.3.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, karuṇācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:11.3.en: How is the heart’s release by compassion developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?

sn46.54:11.4.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, muditācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:11.4.en: How is the heart’s release by rejoicing developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?

sn46.54:11.5.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, upekkhācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā’ti?
sn46.54:11.5.en: How is the heart’s release by equanimity developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?’

sn46.54:12.1.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, mettācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:12.1.en: And how is the heart’s release by love developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?

sn46.54:12.9.pli: Subhaparamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, mettācetovimuttiṁ vadāmi, idhapaññassa bhikkhuno uttarivimuttiṁ appaṭivijjhato.
sn46.54:12.9.en: The apex of the heart’s release by love is the beautiful, I say, for a mendicant who has not penetrated to a higher freedom.

sn46.54:13.1.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, karuṇācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:13.1.en: And how is the heart’s release by compassion developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?

sn46.54:13.7.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanaparamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, karuṇācetovimuttiṁ vadāmi, idhapaññassa bhikkhuno uttarivimuttiṁ appaṭivijjhato.
sn46.54:13.7.en: The apex of the heart’s release by compassion is the dimension of infinite space, I say, for a mendicant who has not penetrated to a higher freedom.

sn46.54:14.1.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, muditācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:14.1.en: And how is the heart’s release by rejoicing developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?

sn46.54:14.7.pli: Viññāṇañcāyatanaparamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, muditācetovimuttiṁ vadāmi, idhapaññassa bhikkhuno uttarivimuttiṁ appaṭivijjhato.
sn46.54:14.7.en: The apex of the heart’s release by rejoicing is the dimension of infinite consciousness, I say, for a mendicant who has not penetrated to a higher freedom.

sn46.54:15.1.pli: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46.54:15.1.en: And how is the heart’s release by equanimity developed? What is its destination, apex, fruit, and end?

sn46.54:15.10.pli: Ākiñcaññāyatanaparamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, upekkhācetovimuttiṁ vadāmi, idhapaññassa bhikkhuno uttarivimuttiṁ appaṭivijjhato”ti.
sn46.54:15.10.en: The apex of the heart’s release by equanimity is the dimension of nothingness, I say, for a mendicant who has not penetrated to a higher freedom.”

mlDocs.title:
Linked Discourses 46.54

Full of Love

sn48.53:5.3.pli: Yaṅgatikāni yaṁparamāni yaṁphalāni yaṁpariyosānāni. Na heva kho kāyena phusitvā viharati;
sn48.53:5.3.en: And although they don’t have direct meditative experience of their destination, apex, fruit, and culmination,

sn48.53:6.4.pli: Yaṅgatikāni yaṁparamāni yaṁphalāni yaṁpariyosānāni. Kāyena ca phusitvā viharati;
sn48.53:6.4.en: They have direct meditative experience of their destination, apex, fruit, and culmination,

6. The Boar’s Cave
A Trainee
